alert.note: Alert for Eastern Loudoun; Western Loudoun (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 14 at 10:18AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A PERIOD OF LIGHT TO MODERATE SNOW WILL AFFECT NORTHWESTERN HOWARD AND NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY COUNTIES IN CENTRAL MARYLAND...SOUTH CENTRAL FREDERICK COUNTY IN NORTH CENTRAL MARYLAND AND CENTRAL LOUDOUN COUNTIES IN NORTHERN VIRGINIA... Snow will coat the ground in spots late this morning, and with temperatures near freezing this may coat untreated surfaces as well. Wind gusts around 30 to 40 mph combined with the snow may reduce visibility to near one-half mile at times. Locations impacted include... Germantown, Leesburg, Damascus, Lansdowne, Poolesville, Purcellville, Round Hill, Boyds, Clarksburg, Belmont, Hamilton, Barnesville, Paeonian Springs, Waterford, Lucketts, Dickerson, Beallsville, Philomont, Lincoln, and Hughesville. This includes Interstate 270 in Maryland between mile markers 16 and 21. Be prepared for slippery surfaces when traveling. Slow down and allow extra time to get to your destination.
